page.title: 08ANOTHER TYPICAL SATURDAY
page.content: Last Saturday I got up and watched some television. Then I had my breakfast and my dad and I went up to my uncle Les to take his wheelbarrow back.Then we loaded the trailer with rubbish and dumped it on the farm scrap heap. We had fish and chips for our dinner.In the afternoon we went to see my mum's friend Geoff because he s selling us a greenhouse. When we got back I had a game of football with my dog. After that I had some tea, then I watched some television before I went to bed.
